Sequence Information.Peptide Name: VmCT2 (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods,  invertebrates, animals; XXA, UCLL1c; Inactive: VsCT1 and VsCT2)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 10 uM), B. subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC 20 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 25 uM), S. typhi ATCC 6399 (MIC 5 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 9027 (MIC 10 uM), and S. agalactiae (MIC 20 uM).Toxicity:  HC50 = 35 uM, moderate hemolytic. Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Ramírez-Carreto S, Quintero-Hernández V, Jiménez-Vargas JM, Corzo G, Possani LD, Becerril B, Ortiz E.2012
Literature Information.Title: Gene cloning and functional characterization of four novel antimicrobial-like peptides from scorpions of the family Vaejovidae.
